content: for all those bsa wood badge bears out there here s a free pattern for you this pattern was created for the intended purpose of making donatable items for the bsa wood badge fundraiser i give permission to freely make items from this pattern to sell or donate or for personal use i only ask that you please help me keep this pattern free and available for its intended use by not selling or claiming the pattern as your own an intermediate skill level and experience with amigurumi is recommended there are pictures throughout the pattern including the end to aid in placement of pieces i recommend reading through the entire pattern before beginning happy crocheting
